name: Adventures of Hood Robin
description:
Play as legendary archer Hood Robin, and fight Castle guards (other than that nothing made yet) getting various types (2) of upgrades 

Keys

A/Left for Left

D/Right for Right

W/Up for jump

Click and Hold to shoot arrows

Tip: If you click and hold long enough, the arrows will go straight.

Credits

Engine - Godot

Art - Kenny's Platformer Pack Medieval

Fonts - Luckiest Guy, Rakyat
